starkcoder.failfast.checks.objects.dates

Interface IObjectDateDefaultProperties

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IChecker, IObjectChecker, IObjectDateChecker, IObjectDateDefaultCheck, IObjectDateNotDefaultCheck
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AChecker, Checker

    public interface IObjectDateDefaultProperties
    Defines properties used by both {link:IObjectDateDefaultCheck} and {link:IObjectDateNotDefaultCheck}.
    Author:
    Keld Oelykke

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Date getDateDefault()
      Default float used by isDateDefault and isDateNotDefault.
      void setDateDefault(Date defaultDateValue)
      Changes the default value used by isDateDefault and isDateNotDefault.

    • Method Detail

      • getDateDefault

        Date getDateDefault()
        Default float used by isDateDefault and isDateNotDefault.

        By default Date is creation time (new Date()). However, a less changing default is chosen: default is set to 0 [ms] from offset year 1970 (new Date(0)).

        Returns:
        default Date - default is new Date(0)

      • setDateDefault

        void setDateDefault(Date defaultDateValue)
        Changes the default value used by isDateDefault and isDateNotDefault.
        Parameters:
        defaultDateValue - new value to set
